title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of establishments 492.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 1.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
The Number of establishments is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The second highest Number of establishments is appeared to be the Month Quebec.
The difference of Number of establishments between the highest and lowest Month is 491.0.
Number of establishments at Month Ontario is 492.0 , second place is Quebec at 267.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 206.0.
The Number of establishments has lowered over the past 13 Months.
Similar Number of establishments is found in Month Northwest Territories, and Nunavut.
The Month Yukon has 4.36 times less Number of establishments than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 1466.0.
